title: How to Seal Between Paving Stones

steps.headline: Fill in all the joints with a fine sand.
steps.description: Try to get it as full as possible.

steps.headline: Purchase a sealer product suitable for your project at your local building center.
steps.description: This product must be waterproof and should dry to create a firm sealer when it dries.

steps.headline: Use a small bottle that pours out a very small stream of liquid.
steps.description: Saturate the sand well on all joints. It will soak in and dry hard in several hours.

text: Fill in all the joints with a fine sand. Try to get it as full as possible. Purchase a sealer product suitable for your project at your local building center. This product must be waterproof and should dry to create a firm sealer when it dries. Use a small bottle that pours out a very small stream of liquid. Saturate the sand well on all joints. It will soak in and dry hard in several hours.
